== Tanalur (CT) (627530) ==

Tanalur (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 14.65 sq. km. and harbouring 8844 households with total population of 47976 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 33 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 320 km. Male population is 22743 and female population is 25233. Scheduled Caste population is 1489 and Scheduled Tribes population is 97. Census Location Code of the town is 627530<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 33 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 40 km. Railway station is at Tanur at a distance of 6 km.
